definition: not equal to/not as good as/inferior to/it would be better to
(negative prefix)/not/no
as/as if/such as
to consider oneself as being not as good as the others
ashamed of being inferior (idiom)/to feel inferior to others
A relative afar is less use than a close neighbor (idiom). Take whatever help is on hand, even from strangers.
pinyin: yuan3 qin1 bu4 ru2 jin4 lin2

definition: it is better to avoid unnecessary trouble (idiom)/the less complications the better
pinyin: duo1 yi1 shi4 bu4 ru2 shao3 yi1 shi4

definition: better to just get the pain over with, rather than prolong the agony
pinyin: chang2 tong4 bu4 ru2 duan3 tong4

definition: things are not as good as they used to be
seeing once is better than hearing a hundred times (idiom); seeing for oneself is better than hearing from many others/seeing is believing
pinyin: bai3 wen2 bu4 ru2 yi1 jian4

definition: worse than a beast/to behave immorally
to be getting worse with each generation
pinyin: yi1 dai4 bu4 ru2 yi1 dai4

definition: worse than a dog or pig/lower than low
the benefits of medicine are not as great as those of good nutrition
pinyin: yao4 bu3 bu4 ru2 shi2 bu3

definition: if you want sth done well, do it yourself (idiom)
pinyin: qiu2 ren2 bu4 ru2 qiu2 ji3

definition: deference is no substitute for obedience (idiom)/(said to accept sb's request, invitation etc)
pinyin: gong1 jing4 bu4 ru2 cong2 ming4

definition: knowing sb by their reputation can't compare to meeting them in person (idiom)
pinyin: wen2 ming2 bu4 ru2 jian4 mian4

definition: Explaining in words is not as good as teaching by example (idiom). Action speaks louder than words.
pinyin: yan2 jiao4 bu4 ru2 shen1 jiao4

sentences.english: I believe someone else suggested it would make a good doormat.
sentences.chinese: 也許會有人說不如把它放在門口做個地墊。

sentences.english: "Well, it isn't as interesting, " said Hurstwood.
sentences.chinese: “哎，也不如芝加哥有意思，”赫斯渥說。

sentences.english: The disappointments of life can knock us down.
sentences.chinese: 生活中種種不如意真的可以打倒我們。

sentences.english: New employees are undependable or do not perform to expectations.
sentences.chinese: 新來的員工不可靠，或表現的不如預期。

sentences.english: This strain of popular discourse and feeling in China is more patriotic than nationalistic.
sentences.chinese: 這種感覺與其說是民族主義不如說是愛國心。

sentences.english: This has happened even in developing-world countries with far less infrastructure than Japan has.
sentences.chinese: 這甚至在基礎設施遠不如日本的發展中國家也是如此。

sentences.english: You might as well go out and repossess cars or work for a collection agency.
sentences.chinese: 你還不如出去收回別人的汽車或爲一家收回機構工作。

sentences.english: Let the woman keep, not equal to practiced a sunflower treasure Dian to calculate from the temple.
sentences.chinese: 讓女人養吧，不如自宮練葵花寶典算了。

sentences.english: The Knicks will score, but not as much as the Celtics.
sentences.chinese: 尼克斯可以不斷取分，但會發現總是不如凱爾特人多。

sentences.english: Instead, check out the company' s reputation through the industry grapevine.
sentences.chinese: 與其這樣做，不如通過行業內線來了解該公司的聲譽。

sentences.english: Next to them, we can only hang our head in shame over our own capacity to adapt.
sentences.chinese: 比起它們，人類對於自己的適應能力只能是自愧不如。

sentences.english: Between these four ways, a less sagacious man would have remained undecided.
sentences.chinese: 在這四條路中，不如他明智的人一定會猶豫不決。

sentences.english: So good, not as good as heart.
He's so clever, he makes me feel inferior.
sentences.chinese: 他是那麼聰明，使我自愧不如。

sentences.english: One bird in the hand is worth two in the wood.
sentences.chinese: 二鳥在林不如一鳥在手。

sentences.english: Instead of looking at leaves as something to rake, think of them as potential fun.
sentences.chinese: 與其把樹葉掃走扔掉，不如找找它潛在的樂趣。

definition: rather than.../與其|与其[yu3 qi2] A 不如[bu4 ru2] B (rather than A, better to B)
there is no harm in/might as well
why not?/why not do (sth)?
compared with
to be on good terms/to be close friends/striving for self-improvement
to fall short of/not as good as/too late
unlike
to excel/to surpass
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
(reduplicated) whether... or.../never mind/fine (indicating acceptance or resignation)
or/still/nevertheless/had better
not necessarily/maybe not
unexpectedly
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
euphemistic variant of 屄[bi1]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
indeed/true! (I agree with you)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
